1.title: Birth
1.description: Sri. Shanthaveri Gopala Gowda was born in Shanthaveri a village in Thirthahalli Taluk of Shimoga District into a poor agricultural family to Kolluraiah Gowda and Seshamma.

2.title: Entered Indiaâ€™s Freedom Struggle Movement
2.description: He was deeply inspired by the Freedom Struggle Movement of Mahatma Gandhiji and joined the movement in 1941
